Title: You Got Zuko'd
Writer: Adam F. Goldberg (created by), David Guarascio, Jennifer Irwin (story editor)
Actors: Wendi McLendon-Covey, Sean Giambrone, Troy Gentile, Hayley Orrantia
Plot: Adam's girlfriend, Jackie, is back after spending her summer at NYU; she has changed so much, it's almost like she's a whole different person. After receiving some not-so-great romantic ...
